metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7653 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
The Eclipse Mosquitto broker up to version 1.4.15 does not reject stringsthat are not valid UTF-8. A malicious client could cause other clients thatdo reject invalid UTF-8 strings to disconnect themselves from the broker bysending a topic string which is not valid UTF-8, and so cause a denial ofservice for the clients.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7653` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmosquitto1 - 1.5.4-1
libmosquittopp1 - 1.5.4-1
mosquitto - 1.5.4-1
mosquitto-clients - 1.5.4-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mosquitto package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.4-1').
